Cuerpo: Master of Science (by research): Computer Science Thesis: Fuzzy and Forgetful L-systems Advisor: Dr. Kamala Krithivasan Indian Institute of Technology, Madras, India. Bachelor of Technology:  Electrical Engineering Research Experience Research Assistant , Cooperative Distributed Problem Solving Lab, University of Massachusetts, Amherst, MA, September 1992 - Present. (COMMON LISP/C) Machine Learning Systems Built a number of machine learning systems in both LISP and C. Programmed ID3, IBL, and CBR systems, wrote code for Genetic Algorithms and designed and built a flexible neural networks simulator in C. (LISP/ C). Pattern Recognition Systems Project leader for a team that built a handwritten numerals recognition system for automated bank check processing.
